detaileddescription.para: Isolation group consists of bridge ports.

If the isolation group type is SAI_ISOLATION_GROUP_TYPE_PORT, then the object should be of type SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_PORT. If the isolation group type is SAI_ISOLATION_GROUP_TYPE_BRIDGE_PORT, then the object should be of type SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_BRIDGE_PORT.

memberdef.definition: typedef sai_status_t(* sai_create_isolation_group_fn) (_Out_ sai_object_id_t *isolation_group_id, _In_ sai_object_id_t switch_id, _In_ uint32_t attr_count, _In_ const sai_attribute_t *attr_list)

memberdef.name: sai_create_isolation_group_fn

simplesect.para: SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error
SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS on success, failure status code on error
